sentence.Network_en: The pointing function of deictic expressions plays a key role in successful communication.
sentence.Network_cn: 指示词语的指示信息是说话人表达意义和听话人理解话语的关键.

例如在交际中必不可少的指示语 ( deictic)系统中, 一个物体相对于说话人的高度是一个非常有用的特征, 但是只有极少数的语言将这个.

list.abs: ...ent King of France),认为指谓短语本身没有意义，具有意义的是包含指谓短语的命题。4.英国语言学家莱昂斯(John Lyons)1968年的(理论语言学导论)有专节讨论代词，指示词这些(deictic categories)。1981年，莱昂斯在(语言与语言学)中提出(指别跟指称有重合之处· · ·但是指称可以是指别的或非指别的，指别不一定涉及指称· · ·)5.英国语用学家列文森在其(语用.

指示词语(deictic expressions)即为语言中自身带有某种语境特征,同时其所指对象又由语境决定的语言形式,可【作者单位】: 江苏南京东南大学外语系 【关键词】: 指示.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek deiktikos, deiktos 'capable of proof', from deiknunai 'to show'

means.word_mean: 1. a word specifying identity or spacial or temporal location from the perspective of a speaker or hearer in the context in which the communication occurs;

sentences.sentence: "words that introduce particulars of the speaker's and hearer's shared cognitive field into the message"- R.Rommetveit

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or characteristic of a word whose reference depends on the circumstances of its use;
